scripts.test:smoke: yarn playwright install && MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ga-smoke REPORT_DIR=test-results/smokeTest REPORT_FILE=test-results/smokeTest/results.xml npx codeceptjs run --grep @smoke-tests --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:api-prod: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=api-prod FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 5 --grep '@api-prod' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:api-nonprod: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=api-nonprod FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs  run-workers --suites 7 --grep '@api-prod|@api-nonprod' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:api-nightly-prod: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=api-nightly-prod PROCEED_ON_FAILURE=true FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 4 --grep '@api-nightly-prod|@api-prod' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:api-adjourn-ga: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=api-adjourn-ga FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @api-adjourn-ga --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:api-add-info: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=api-add-info FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @api-add-info --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:api-ga-access: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=api-ga-access FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @api-ga-access --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-prod: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-prod FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 10 --grep '@ui-prod' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-nonprod: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-nonprod FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs  run-workers --suites 10 --grep '@ui-prod|@ui-nonprod' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-nightly-prod: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-nightly-prod FUNCTIONAL=true PROCEED_ON_FAILURE=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 6 --grep '@ui-prod|@ui-nightly-prod' --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-add-info: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-add-info FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @ui-add-info --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-collections: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-collections FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @ui-collections --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-final-order: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-final-order FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @ui-final-order --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-ga-notice: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-ga-notice FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @ui-ga-notice --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
scripts.test:ui-wa: MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=ui-wa FUNCTIONAL=true npx codeceptjs run-workers --suites 2 --grep @ui-wa --reporter mocha-multi --verbose
